participant_1.background:
I love to read.
I started collaborating with some popular publishers.
I ve found other pretty good blogs to share opinions with.
I started a small blog lately to post reviews.

participant_2.background:
I get my nails done every saturday.
My family owns a grocery store.
I daydream about cafes in paris.
I work as a receptionist at a lawyer s office.

content.text: I love reading! I started a blog recently to post reviews of the books I read.
That's cool! I love reading too, but I don't have anyone to share my thoughts with.
You should check out some of the blogs I've been reading. They're really great.
Thanks, I will! I love finding new blogs to read.
Oh, and I also collaborate with some popular publishers.
Really? That's awesome! I've always wanted to work with a publisher.
It's really great! I get to read a lot of new books and share my thoughts on them.
That sounds like a dream job!
It is! I love it.
So, what are some of your favorite books?
I love a lot of different genres, but I'm a big fan of historical fiction and fantasy.
Me too! I love historical fiction because it's so interesting to learn about different time periods.
And I love fantasy because it's so creative and allows me to escape from reality.
Exactly! I love getting lost in a good book.
Me too!
So, what are you reading right now?
I'm reading a book called "The Secret History" by Donna Tartt. It's a mystery set at a prestigious university.
Oh, I've heard good things about that book. I'll have to check it out.
I'm really enjoying it so far. It's a bit slow at the beginning, but it picks up after a while.
I'm glad to hear that. I'll definitely put it on my list.
